title: Sonus Networks to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 28, 2015
text: Sonus Networks to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 28, 2015   Published on 2015-09-28 10:01:22 Sonus Networks to Report Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on October 28,... -- WESTFORD, Mass.  Sonus Networks, Inc. Corporate Logo Sonus Networks, Inc. Corporate Logo <-  <- stripped tags -> WESTFORD, Mass.   [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWMyOXVkWE51WlhSM2IzSnJjeTVqYjIwdlhDSWdjbVZzUFZ3aWJtOW1iMnhzYjNkY0lpQjBZWEpuWlhROVhDSmZZbXhoYm10Y0lqNVRiMjUxY3lCT1pYUjNiM0pyY3p3dllUND18]], Inc. (Nasdaq: [[]]), a global leader in enabling and securing real-time communications, today announced that it will report financial results for the third quarter of 2015 before the open of the market on Wednesday, October 28, 2015 . Following the release, Sonus will host a conference call with the financial community at 8:30 a.m. ET to discuss the results. The company will offer a live, listen-only Webcast of the conference call via the Sonus Networks Investor Web site at [[]] where a replay will also be available shortly following the conference call. Conference call details: Dial-in number: 800 667 1520International Callers: +1 312 429 1274 Replay information: A telephone playback of the call will be available following the conference call until November 11, 2015 and can be accessed by calling 800 633 8284 or +1 402 977 9140 for international callers. The reservation number for the replay is 21778358. Tags: Sonus Networks, Sonus, SONS, 2015 third quarter, earnings, results. About Sonus Networks Sonus brings the next generation of Cloud-based SIP and 4G/VoLTE solutions to its customers by enabling and securing mission critical traffic for VoIP, video, IM and online collaboration. With Sonus, enterprises can intelligently secure and prioritize real-time communications, while service providers can deliver reliable, secure real-time services for mobile, UC and social applications. Sonus offers an award-winning portfolio of hardware-based and virtualized Session Border Controllers (SBCs), Diameter Signaling Controllers (DSCs), Network-as-a-Service (NaaS) capabilities, Policy/Routing servers and media/signaling gateways. Visit www.sonus.net or call 1-855-GO-SONUS. For more information:
